meanings.definition: A system of money in general use in a particular country.
meanings.sent1: In the game, gold coins are the currency used to buy items.
meanings.sent2: The currency in Japan is the yen.
meanings.sent3: I tried to pay for my coffee with game currency, but the barista didn't accept it.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the currency that won over everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The currency of trust is invaluable in any relationship.

meanings.definition: The fact or quality of being widely accepted or in use.
meanings.sent1: English is a currency spoken by many people around the world.
meanings.sent2: The currency of love transcends all barriers.
meanings.sent3: His jokes were the currency that kept the party alive.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is the universal currency that brings people together.
meanings.sent5: Kindness is a currency that never loses its value.
